definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Great Plain, [´[[ת]]: Baer Gi; van d. H. [[תַּעֲנׇח]], exc. Jos 21:25, 1Ch 7:29]; usu. named with Megiddo: old Can. City, Ju Jdg 5:19, Jos 12:21 ( = Egypt. Ta-‘-n-k-â, Ta-‘a-na-k, WMM:As. u. Eur. 170, 195); assigned to Manasseh Jos 17:11, Jos 21:25, Je 1:27, 1Ch 7:29 (yet within territory of Issachar Jos 17:11, Jos 19:18 ff.); named also 1Ki 4:12; LXX Qanaax, Qaanax, Tanax, etc.; = mod. Ta‘annuk, c. 4 1/2 m. SSE. from Lejjun (Megiddo), Rob:BR iii. 117 Guevrin:Sam. ii. 226 ff. Buhl:G 288 f. Wilson:Hast. DB TAANACH.
